TextLibrary.Text: Sunspear
You seem troubled.
You seem troubled.
You seem troubled.
You seem troubled.
It's nothing.
It's nothing.
It's nothing.
It's nothing.
No. I have watched you since we took the Eye of Sartek from the Elves. You feel guilty.
No. I have watched you since we took the Eye of Sartek from the Elves. You feel guilty.
No. I have watched you since we took the Eye of Sartek from the Elves. You feel guilty.
No. I have watched you since we took the Eye of Sartek from the Elves. You feel guilty.
The Elves are allies of my people. I betrayed their trust.
The Elves are allies of my people. I betrayed their trust.
The Elves are allies of my people. I betrayed their trust.
The Elves are allies of my people. I betrayed their trust.
You did no such thing. Asking the Queen first was honorable. Your actions after that were born of necessity.
You did no such thing. Asking the Queen first was honorable. Your actions after that were born of necessity.
You did no such thing. Asking the Queen first was honorable. Your actions after that were born of necessity.
You did no such thing. Asking the Queen first was honorable. Your actions after that were born of necessity.
It changes nothing.
It changes nothing.
It changes nothing.
It changes nothing.
Perhaps not. But it is not over - you can still put things right.
Perhaps not. But it is not over - you can still put things right.
Perhaps not. But it is not over - you can still put things right.
Perhaps not. But it is not over - you can still put things right.
How?
How?
How?
How?
If we travel to the Dragons' Graveyard, we may be able to find and fashion another eye for the Elves of Silvermyr.
If we travel to the Dragons' Graveyard, we may be able to find and fashion another eye for the Elves of Silvermyr.
If we travel to the Dragons' Graveyard, we may be able to find and fashion another eye for the Elves of Silvermyr.
If we travel to the Dragons' Graveyard, we may be able to find and fashion another eye for the Elves of Silvermyr.
Thank you, Sunspear. You are a good friend.
Thank you, Sunspear. You are a good friend.
Thank you, Sunspear. You are a good friend.
Thank you, Sunspear. You are a good friend.
